root.title: Hidden Executable In NTFS Alternate Data Stream
root.description: Detects the creation of an ADS (Alternate Data Stream) that contains an executable by looking at a non-empty Imphash
root.author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), @0xrawsec

logsource.definition: Requirements: Sysmon or equivalent configured with Imphash logging

falsepositives.item: This rule isn't looking for any particular binary characteristics. As legitimate installers and programs were seen embedding hidden binaries in their ADS. Some false positives are expected from browser processes and similar.
